description.raw:
Major pull request including largescale implementation changes to the bases and operators.  Main feature changes that affect users are outlined below:

Additions:

* SinCos parity basis

* Nonlinear BVP solver

* Hilbert transform operator

* MPI Alltoallv-based distributed transposes

* Many parsing additions

    * Substitution rules for text-replacement

    * Fields as NCCs

    * Compound derivatives, i.e. "d(u, x=5)"

* Tolerance-based NCC expansions

Changes:

* Dropping the "2" from the package name

* Move default config file to package level

* Basis objects require names on instantiation

* Problem objects require domain on instantiation

* Solver objects are obtained from problem method, not by direct instantiation

Removals:

* No more sympy dependency: all parsing done though operator trees

* basis.grid-shaped arrays no longer allowed as NCCs.  Use fields instead.

Examples have been updated and extended.
